master_index.description: The master index for all core campaign and system data files for the Dragon Legacy Narrative System (dlttrpg2.0).

files.purpose: The foundational rules for the 2d6 narrative system, including attributes, skills, and progression.
Contains the universal moves that any character can perform (e.g., Engage an Enemy, Investigate a Scene).
The guide for the Game Master, outlining principles, agenda, and a list of generic GM moves.
A directory containing the 15 unique playbooks for Rya and her companions.
Defines the core 'Unleash Draconic Power' move for all 12 of Rya's lineages.
Details the supporting systems for Rya's abilities, including Aspect Mastery, Manifestations, and Draconic Unity.
A comprehensive list of the specific 'Draconic Techniques' Rya can learn as she masters her lineages.
The consolidated and complete list of all standard and magical weapons, armor, and gear.
The fully converted list of powerful, evolving legacy artifacts tied to specific characters and their narrative arcs.
Contains the core world lore, including the Public History, the Secret Truth, and narrative Lore Moves.
Details on all world factions, reframed with narrative drives, GM moves, and key questions.
A comprehensive gazetteer of all world locations, complete with descriptions and narrative GM hooks.
Defines the world map and the core 'Make the Journey' move for handling travel.
The first part of the monster manual (Tiers 1-10), converted to the narrative system.
The second part of the monster manual (Tiers 11+ and Bosses), converted to the narrative system.
A directory of detailed maps for key locations, including rooms, exits, and narrative events.
The narrative roadmap for the first chapter of the campaign, including the recruitment quest and major story beats.
Details the system for finding hidden Masters who can teach unique 'Master Moves'.
Details the 'Legacy's Rest' town-building subsystem and its core mechanics.
The directory for the active campaign's state files.
The directory containing the template files for starting a new game.
